body: code can not change to name ,because of workflow is not exist .when workflow is online should return name
and i think the `failover` is a common issue, becuase if process is running, just worker service break down, now DS just will clone a new TaskInstance and dispatch to a new Worker to running again.

@caffreyZ Actually, it is not a good practice to use hiveserver2 for scheduled hive tasks in production. Hiveserver2 is a better choice for ad-hoc query. For scheduling purpose, you may try hive CLI. You could do it with shell task if you are using an old version of DS. ### Description

The indicators on the home page should be instructive in the operation and maintenance operation.(首页的指标要在运维操作中有一定的指导性)

### Use case

This part needs in-depth discussion and redesign. Different roles care about different dimension indicators.
1. Number of projects, number of online workflows/number of offline workflows, number of tasks to be scheduled/number of tasks that have been successfully scheduled
2. Count the number of task successes, failures, stops, and other statuses by hour (the statuses need to be combined into a design)
3. Statistics of running failures (by workflow dimension, count the number of times the schedule fails to execute on the date)
4. Running time statistics (according to the workflow dimension, the average duration of scheduled execution on a statistical date)
5. CPU, memory, load, number of tasks executed by sub-workers, etc. that the operation and maintenance personnel care about

这部分需要深入讨论和重新设计下，不同的角色关心不同的维度指标。
1. 项目数、上线的工作流数/ 下线的工作流数、应调度任务数/已经成功调度任务数
2. 分小时统计任务成功、失败、停止、和其他状态的数量（需要把状态做一个合并设计）
3. 运行失败的统计 （按工作流维度，统计日期调度执行失败的次数）
4. 运行时长统计（按工作流维度，统计日期调度执行的平均时长）
5. 运维人员关心的cpu、内存、负载、分worker执行任务数等

* jetty-server-9.4.43.v20210629.jar: CVE-2022-2048(7.5)
* jetty-util-9.4.43.v20210629.jar: CVE-2022-2048(7.5)
